name: FriendlyFire (espirehendo)
description:
I actually made this for the AI in games jam but i missed the deadline. Thought it was Sunday, not Saturday : (

Anyway, uploading Saturday for lols and probably for the best as this is not at all a good Demo of either good AI or good Game Design but I had fun hacking away at this for a few days on the weekend.  Feel free to give me some feedback, I might try actually finish and polish this at some point.
